materials.raw_text: La: 30 g, Mg: 15 g, Si: 30 g, Zn: 10 g

sourcing.instructions: La: Rare earth suppliers; Mg: Metal supply stores; Si: Silicon suppliers; Zn: Metal supply stores
steps: La: Rare earth suppliers; Mg: Metal supply stores; Si: Silicon suppliers; Zn: Metal supply stores
1. Weigh out 30 g of La, 15 g of Mg, 30 g of Si, and 10 g of Zn using a precision scale.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Weigh out 30 g of La, 15 g of Mg, 30 g of Si, and 10 g of Zn using a precision scale.

steps: 1. Preheat a furnace or kiln to 1000°C.
heating.raw_text: 1. Preheat a furnace or kiln to 1000°C.

steps: 1. After 2 hours, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down to room temperature naturally (approximately 4-6 hours).
cooling.raw_text: 1. After 2 hours, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down to room temperature naturally (approximately 4-6 hours).

steps: 1. Check the solidified sample for any irregularities or rough edges.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Check the solidified sample for any irregularities or rough edges.
